TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_nu_Sakul_acaculilan_adadan-1, title = nu_Sakul_acaculilan_adadan-1, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/nu_Sakul_acaculilan_adadan-1} }

S.FORM: 1878年以前 ayaw cacay walu pitu walu a mihcan nu aidangan nu sakidaya kuyniyan 被巍峨的七腳外山 ya talakaway nu cikasuwan a buyu` 和碧綠的美崙溪 atu langlang dawayan a sauwac nu bilung takec sa miyamaw tadamanay a kakitidan 以藍天為畫布 sumilaw ku tahpu nu demiad u salengac nuladem tebing mala cuung I langdaway Nu tungdud nu buyu` 這裡就是 撒固兒 u sakul kuy nayan 撒奇萊雅的美麗之鄉 u salungannay a nyadu` nu sakidaya 族人敬畏天地 tadiecsa ku pinacadan kaybaung tu paudipay Si pakelid paudipay kungalar nu tademaw ulicsa I kulus nu buyu` mi siwatid sadawdawbi`sa malecad tu mu dadiWay nu lalicay unika tatungtungdud nu dicem malecad tu duku nu malukay 山的手指輕輕的彿過 sa ahemaw kunisa diwang nu taludu` nu buyu`sa kuli nubuyu`malatenesay nu midangay Hay sadikud kasinuung ma hida u na kamuwan kasa lupiku nu dadan u tatungdud malalangdaway mala Langat I tap

1878年以前 ayaw cacay walo pito walo a mihcan no aidangan no sakidaya koyniyan 被巍峨的七腳外山 ya talakaway no cikasowan a boyo` 和碧綠的美崙溪 ato langlang dawayan a saowac no bilong takec sa miyamaw tadamanay a kakitidan 以藍天為畫布 somilaw ko tahpo no demiad o salengac noladem tebing mala coong I langdaway No tongdod no boyo` 這裡就是 撒固兒 o sakol koy nayan 撒奇萊雅的美麗之鄉 o salongannay a nyado` no sakidaya 族人敬畏天地 tadiecsa ko pinacadan kaybaong to paodipay Si pakelid paodipay kongalar no tademaw olicsa I kolos no boyo` mi siwatid sadawdawbi`sa malecad to mo dadiWay no lalicay onika tatongtongdod no dicem malecad to doko no malokay 山的手指輕輕的彿過 sa ahemaw konisa diwang no talodo` no boyo`sa koli noboyo`malatenesay no midangay Hay sadikod kasinoong ma hida o na kamowan kasa lopiko no dadan o tatongdod malalangdaway mala Langat I tap
